q: Allen Iverson made all six of his free throws in the final 23.2 seconds, helping the Nuggets snap a six-game road losing streak that included losses at Dallas and New Orleans at the start of the three-game road trip. It was definitely important, Denver center Marcus Camby said. "We got our butts kicked the other night down in New Orleans against a great team. They're all house trained, and they're in a loving environment. We do have dogs in the program that were used for fighting. An investor purchased the estate after Michael Vick , who grew up in Newport News, Va., sold the property, and the price has been reduced considerably since the economic downfall, Severy said.
